job_tasks.phrase: Analyseren en verwerken van complexe data: Je gebruikt machine learning, data mining en deep learning-technologieën om waardevolle inzichten te genereren.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of analyzing and processing complex data using ML, data mining, and deep learning technologies to generate insights, which aligns with data engineering and management for model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van voorspellende modellen: Met statistische modellen en algoritmes onthul je verborgen patronen in data en maak je toekomstvoorspellingen mogelijk.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development of predictive models using statistical models and algorithms, which is a core task in traditional machine learning model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Bouwen van end-to-end oplossingen: Je creëert niet alleen Proof of Concepts (PoC's), maar ontwikkelt robuuste oplossingen die direct in productie kunnen worden gebruikt.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software engineering task of building robust, end-to-end solutions that can be used in production, going beyond just PoCs.

job_tasks.phrase: Operationaliseren van AI-modellen: Je zorgt ervoor dat je oplossingen schaalbaar en toepasbaar zijn in de praktijk, inclusief deployment en monitoring.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase covers the operationalization of AI models, including scalability, deployment, and monitoring, which falls under MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken binnen het AI-team: Je werkt samen met het Center of Excellence (CoE) of direct met de klant om hoogwaardige oplossingen te realiseren
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration within the AI team and with clients to realize solutions, fitting the communication and collaboration category.

soft_skills.phrase: Als Machine Learning Engineer bij Sogeti maak je deel uit van een hechte en ondersteunende community, waar collega-Sogetisten elkaar niet alleen helpen maar ook inspireren. Samen met een enthousiast divers team werk je aan uitdagende klantprojecten en innovatieve oplossingen. Daarnaast krijg je de ruimte om jezelf verder te ontwikkelen en verder de inhoud in te duiken. (verdiepen in expertise) Bij Sogeti draait het om samenwerking, groei en plezier in wat je doet!
soft_skills.justification: This paragraph describes the company culture and the role's contribution to client projects and innovative solutions, implying a need to understand business context and contribute strategically.

soft_skills.phrase: Daarnaast krijg je de ruimte om jezelf verder te ontwikkelen en verder de inhoud in te duiken. (verdiepen in expertise)
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly states that the candidate will have the space to develop themselves further and delve deeper into expertise, indicating a focus on learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Samen met een enthousiast divers team werk je aan uitdagende klantprojecten
soft_skills.justification: This phrase highlights working with a diverse team on client projects, which requires collaboration and communication skills.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional machine learning tasks such as analyzing complex data, developing predictive models, and operationalizing AI models. While there's mention of working with clients and developing solutions, there is no specific mention of Generative AI technologies like LLMs, RAG, or related frameworks. The tasks fall under Macro-Category B (Model Development & Fine-Tuning, Data Engineering & Management) and Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration, Operations & MLOps), with a strong emphasis on the ML aspects. Therefore, 'Core ML Engineer' is the most appropriate profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines traditional ML tasks and operationalization, but it lacks specific details about the technologies or frameworks used. It also doesn't mention Generative AI, which is crucial for distinguishing between ML and GenAI roles. The confidence is high for it being an ML role, but moderate for the 'Core ML Engineer' specific classification due to the absence of explicit tool mentions.
